Question.Subject: Verizon FiOS VS. Comcast (XFinity)?
Question.Content:
These are two local competitors in my area, but they are very big name companies so I am willing to bet a lot of you have the same competition. I always hear them slamming one another on the radio and TV.
Which is better in your opinion and why?
LET THE FEUD BEGIN, GO!
Question.ChosenAnswer: FiOS. No question, no contest, no argument, no feud. FiOS hands down. Fiber optic > coaxial. Also, last I knew, Commiecast liked to compress their HD channels so heavily that you could see a huge difference when comparing them to the much lighter compression on FiOS.

Answer.Content: FiOS. No question, no contest, no argument, no feud. FiOS hands down. Fiber optic > coaxial. Also, last I knew, Commiecast liked to compress their HD channels so heavily that you could see a huge difference when comparing them to the much lighter compression on FiOS.
